sense.def:
To be immune to a disease
pomeni, da ne moremo zboleti za neko boleznijo.

seg.quote: She thought that women might be immune to lung cancer.
Babies receive immunity to a variety of infections.

sense.def:
Kdor je
immune to something harmful
, nekaj škodljivega ne more vplivati nanj ali se mu zgoditi.

seg.quote: He was immune to the flattery of political leaders.
...targets that the West had considered immune from air attack.
He had been granted immunity from prosecution.
